Education

MA in Mathematics, University of Nebraska at Omaha UNO, Omaha, NE, USA.

Links  - My GitHub page!  - My Tableau Page!  - Me in LinkedIn!

Older version

articles.title: Welcome to my website!!!
articles.contents:
A multidisciplinary research professional scientist, with a Ph.D. in Biostatistics, a Master of Arts (MA) in Mathematics, proficient in Statistical/Biostatistical methods, and machine learning modeling approaches using Python, R/RStudio, MATLAB, BayesiaLab, SAS, and SPSS. Experience in database management systems (Teradata, Oracle) and data visualization (SQL, RShiny, Tableau, PowerBI), integration on Git/GitHub.



Highly motivated and enthusiastic to explore and build statistical and machine learning models with messy data, big data, and high dimensional data as well as to enhance my knowledge with new technology skills.
Nirosha Rathnayake, Ph.D., Data Scientist (Sr. Analyst), First National Bank of Omaha.
